This is a list of packages to be built within the CYBOP project.
Packages which are NOT implemented yet are put in brackets [].


CYBOP -- Programming Theory
___________________________

cybop.deb [meta package]
- depends:      cybop-books, cybop-papers, cybop-presentations
- category:     doc

[cybop-books.deb]
- recommends:   cybop-papers, cybop-presentations
- suggests:     cyboi, cybol-examples
- category:     doc
- install:      doc/books/* usr/share/doc/cybop/books

cybop-papers.deb
- recommends:   cybop-books, cybop-presentations
- suggests:     cyboi, cybol-examples
- category:     doc
- install:      doc/papers/* usr/share/doc/cybop/papers

cybop-presentations.deb
- recommends:   cybop-books, cybop-papers
- suggests:     cyboi, cybol-examples
- category:     doc
- install:      doc/presentations/* usr/share/doc/cybop/presentations


CYBOI -- Interpreter Program
____________________________

cyboi.deb
- depends:      libc6, xlibs, libxml2
- recommends:   cybol-core, cybol-examples, cybol-healthcare
- suggests:     cyboi-doc, cyboi-dev
- category:     interpreters
- install:      bin/cyboi usr/bin
                doc/cyboi/cyboi.1.gz usr/share/man/man1

cyboi-dev.deb
- depends:      libc6, xlibs, libxml2, libxml2-dev
- suggests:     cyboi
- category:     devel
- install:      admin/Makefile usr/share/cyboi-dev
                admin/exclude usr/share/cyboi-dev

cyboi-doc.deb
- recommends:   cybop-doc-papers, cybop-doc-presentations
- suggests:     cyboi
- category:     doc
- install:      doc/cyboi/manual.txt usr/share/doc/cyboi-doc


CYBOL -- XML-based Language
___________________________

cybol.deb
- recommends:   cybol-examples
- suggests:     cybol-core, cybol-healthcare
- category:     misc
- install:      ?? usr/share/xml/cybol/custom
                ?? usr/share/xml/cybol/misc
                doc/cybol/cybol.dtd usr/share/xml/cybol/schema/dtd
                ?? usr/share/xml/cybol/stylesheet
DENNIS! Bitte lies den folgenden Link:
http://debian-xml-sgml.alioth.debian.org/xml-policy/index.html (besonders Chapter 3)
Du solltest verstehen, wie "dh_installxmlcatalogs" etc. funktionieren,
damit wir eine CYBOL DTD in Debian installieren koennen.
Brauchen wir ueberhaupt so einen Katalog-Eintrag?
Als CYBOL Header schlage ich vor:
<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE book PUBLIC "-//CYBOP//DTD CYBOL XML V1.0//EN" "http://cybop.berlios.de/cybol/cybol.dtd">

[cybol-core.deb]
- depends:      cyboi
- recommends:   cybol-examples
- suggests:     cybol-healthcare
- category:     misc
- install:      cybol/core/* usr/share/cybol/core

cybol-examples.deb
- depends:      cyboi
- suggests:     cybol-core, cybol-healthcare
- category:     misc
- install:      examples/addition/run.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/addition
                examples/addition/startup.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/addition
                examples/exit/run.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/exit
                examples/exit_cybol_file/exit.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/exit_cybol_file
                examples/exit_cybol_file/run.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/exit_cybol_file
                examples/exit_text_file/exit.txt usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/exit_text_file
                examples/exit_text_file/run.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/exit_text_file
                examples/helloworld/run.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld
                examples/helloworld/startup.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld
                examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/run.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic
                examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/send_greeting.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic
                examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/shutdown.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic
                examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic/startup.cybol usr/share/doc/cybol/examples/helloworld_dynamic_logic

[cybol-healthcare.deb]
- depends:      cyboi, cybol-core
- recommends:   cybol-examples
- suggests:     resmedicinae
- category:     misc
- install:      cybol/healthcare/* usr/share/cybol/healthcare
